data.title: José Luis Sosa – Galindo, Arias & López
data.text:
Jose Luis Sosa joined Galindo, Arias & López in 2008 and in 2020 he was promoted to Partner. His management at the firm focuses on business law, corporate law, project finance, and tax law, with an emphasis on domestic and international business transactions, mergers and acquisitions, and real estate transactions.

He is suitable to practice in Panama and New York.

Publications

Reorganization as a new alternative in Panama, 2020.

Fintech Regulation in Latin America, 2020.

Panama Country Review”, Chambers & Partners Latin America 2018.

Project Finance Review“, Latin Lawyer 2018.

Panama Country Review”, Chambers & Partners Latin America 2017.

Project Finance Review“, Latin Lawyer 2017.

Project Finance Review”, Latin Lawyer 2016.

Millicom LIH, S.A:

The firm advised Millicom LIH, S.A., a leading provider of cable TV and mobile telephone services in emerging markets such as Latin America and Africa, in the acquisition of 80% of the shares of Cable Onda, S.A., at an enterprise value of $1,460 millions. (October, 2018).

China State Construction Engineering Corporation Ltd:

Advice to China State Construction Engineering Corporation Ltd. in the development and construction of the Ciudad de Esperanza Residential Project (2015 award-winning project), promoted by the Ministry of Housing of Panama, which will have the development of 2,250 homes, schools, and a headquarters of the University of Panama, as well as recreational areas. (November, 2017).

Panama Canal Authority and Mayer Brown:

Advice to the Panama Canal Authority (ACP) and the international legal team of the firm Mayer Brown, in all legal matters arising from the construction of the third set of locks of the Panama Canal. (July, 2017).
